name: Blob TD
description:
Blob Tower Defense is a tower defense game where you are helping the Blobs defend their Blobberous kingdom from the Evil Blobs.

Blob Tower Defense breaks the mold from other tower defense games in various ways:

1. It requires a rock-paper-scissor strategy. The Blobs can only attack Evil Blobs whose color does not match their own. Also the Evil Blobs have special powers such as Healing and Camouflage that must be counteracted.

2. The enemies have random movements and spawn patterns, making the same level different every time. They bounce all over the place causing unexpected results.

3. Game Center is enabled allowing you to try to outdo players from across the globe.
